name: Mecatron
description:
Mecatron is a 2D game in an post-apocalyptic scenario in which the player is a robot that needs to repair the control towers to ensure its survival from its enemies.

This is a game for the Global Game Jam 2020:

Theme: Repair.

Survival game the player needs to pick up the pieces and repair towers and survive until all enemies are defeated.

Controls

Movement - WASD / ARROWS

Made by:

HUILTON CARLOS (@HUILTONCARLOS) - GD MANAGER

KELLEN KAROLLYNE (@_PRODUCAT) - GD ARTIST 2D

JORGE LUIZ "LUNATE" (@LUNOITO) - ARTIST 2D
